md:
giải nghĩa từ "cling" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Cling (verb): bám, dính, bám chặt, ôm
	+ Meaning: to hold tightly to something or someone
	+ Example: She clung to her mother's hand as they walked through the crowded street.
	+ Related words: clingy, clinging, clings

* Cling (noun): sự bám, sự dính
	+ Meaning: a feeling of holding tightly to something or someone
	+ Example: Her cling to her childhood memories was strong.
	+ Related words: clinginess, clinging

* Clingy (adjective): bám, dính, ôm
	+ Meaning: holding tightly to something or someone
	+ Example: He's a clingy boyfriend, always wanting to be close to his girlfriend.
	+ Related words: cling, clinging

* Clinging (verb): bám, dính, ôm
	+ Meaning: holding tightly to something or someone
	+ Example: The child was clinging to her favorite toy.
	+ Related words: cling, clingy

* Clings (verb): bám, dính, ôm
	+ Meaning: holds tightly to something or someone
	+ Example: The fabric clings to her body.
	+ Related words: cling, clinging
html:
giải nghĩa từ "cling" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Cling (verb): bám, dính, bám chặt, ôm

    • Meaning: to hold tightly to something or someone
    • Example: She clung to her mother's hand as they walked through the crowded street.
    • Related words: clingy, clinging, clings

  • Cling (noun): sự bám, sự dính

    • Meaning: a feeling of holding tightly to something or someone
    • Example: Her cling to her childhood memories was strong.
    • Related words: clinginess, clinging

  • Clingy (adjective): bám, dính, ôm

    • Meaning: holding tightly to something or someone
    • Example: He's a clingy boyfriend, always wanting to be close to his girlfriend.
    • Related words: cling, clinging

  • Clinging (verb): bám, dính, ôm

    • Meaning: holding tightly to something or someone
    • Example: The child was clinging to her favorite toy.
    • Related words: cling, clingy

  • Clings (verb): bám, dính, ôm

    • Meaning: holds tightly to something or someone
    • Example: The fabric clings to her body.
    • Related words: cling, clinging
